description:

title: The Spirit Of Radio

description:
it actually goes from the 3rd fret B string back to open E string (not a pull-off to open B).  You can see this in the old tabs and in tutorials Lifeson has given.  The open E in the old tabs is a ghost note.  Lifeson generally seems to play it but in teaching the riff tends to emphasize the pull off parts.
(via editor)
title: The Spirit Of Radio
